name: Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 24: Last Bronx: Tokyo Bangaichi
synopsis: The ultimate urban brawl! The rule of the fist says that only the strongest will control the streets. Problem is, the rule doesn't mention taking to the streets with sticks, poles, nunchukus, or tonfas. Master your weapons or step out of the way. Do battle with 8 authentic martial arts weapons. Choose from 8 kick-butt fighters. Eye-popping 60fps hi-resolution graphics. Five unique gameplay modes, seriously enhanced from the kicking Sega coin-op game.
